name: Nuxt
reason: The backbone of this project, a simple framework that makes developing with Vue.js a walk in the park.

name: Vue.js
reason: The foundation and spine of this project, used through Nuxt.

name: TailwindCSS
reason: Makes styling and designing this site a breeze (no pun intended).

name: Nuxt Icon
reason: Where all the icons in this project come from. A simple, easy solution to the complex problem of icons.
